dcterms:description: MIMIC-III is an extensive, anonymized dataset comprising over 40,000 patient records from intensive care units at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center. It encompasses a diverse range of data, including laboratory measurements, vital signs, medications, and medical notes, specifically focusing on predicting ICD codes for discharge summaries.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III
